title: PBE
body: I would like to see a pbe in oce and that we can get pbe permanent in it. Maybe the way we can earn a pce account is by getting 5 tokens from winning a certain amount of games in league. Then we redeem all 5 tokens at once and we can create 1 free pbe account that is perma.

replies.body: The players who play on pbe are hand chosen by riot games and is mostly for youtuber with over 100k subs so mate oce being small and having a huge bronze - gold player rate this aint goin to happen
The OCE server is too small to have a pbe thus the reason why only NA and EUW have them
